LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_1stMutationChance: Configure the first group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_2ndMutationChance: Configure the second group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_3rdMutationChance: Configure the third group of mutations
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ChanceToHaveAMutatedGene: Chance to have a mutated gene
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_AllowedMutatedXenoGene_T: Default: Mutated genes can only be endogenes
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_AllowedMutatedArchiteGen: Mutated genes can be archite genes
Defaul: Mutated genes can not be archite genes
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_MinimumMetabolicEffForMu: Minimum metabolic efficiency allowed when generating mutation
The minimum metabolic efficiency allowed used by ONLY this mod. Default is -5
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_ChanceWithCarcinomaGrowi: The chance to develop random mutation with a growing carcinoma every 5000 ticks (60k ticks/day)
These muations do NOT obey minimum metabolic efficiency and are always xenogene. Default: 5%
LanguageData.Buggy_MP_Option_LetterText: {0}'s genes have mutated due to a growing carcinoma. {1} is now in his/her xenogenes.
